amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section which allows for eligibility of communities in federal flood insurance programs despite the presence of manufactured or mobile homes in those communities which are located in areas of flood risk.

action.text: Mr. Kennedy (MA) raised a point of order against the Ney amendment (A029). Mr. Kennedy stated that the provisions of the amendment offered by Mr. Ney exceed the scope of the bill and that the amendment was not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
